text: A stylish villain for the super stylish Arvind Swamy Ask a normal person, and he'd say the week was just too mundane. Ask an IndiaGlitz follower, and he has a week long story to tell you! Welcome to IndiaGlitz weekly roundup, where the hottest news of the week are cherry-picked just for you. Anyone would be able to tell that weeks like this, and the one to come would surely pack a heap of good stuff. For starters, Bogan's release had us at edge, with big timers like release of the first look poster of 'Thala57' grabbed insane attention. The week had more to offer though.. Keep reading. Kicking off, take a look at how Vijay's Bairavaa and 'KIN' fared at the Chennai Box Office during the post Republic Day weekend. How has 'Bairavaa' and 'KIN' performed in the weekend after R'Day ? They say that good becomes better by playing against better, but better doesn't become the best by playing against good. Kamal Haasan, who has projected himself as an iron willed personality, usually stands by his ideals no matter what. This time though, for the best, he has decided to learn from his professional rival. You know what we're talking about, don't you? Sigh. Click here. True Friendship ! Kamal ready to even give up his ideology for Rajini Maybe it is blue moon after all, because a rare coincidence might make the two kings Ajith and Vijay to meet. Maybe not a biggie to the stars themselves, but to us, WOA !!! Big stuff if it happened. Check it out. Whoa! Thala -Thalapathy to share the same space after a long time ? Vikram will be starring in a Vijay Chander film. Meant to pair with him was the 'Premam' beauty Sai Pallavi, but was later called off. So, who's her replacement? Find out here on Vikram's fresh pair for his next project. Buzz! Tamannah to pair up with Vikram for the first time Get ready to get your eyes rolling, as you read the official information on the complete cast and crew of 'Thalapathy61'. Oops, we might've actually just broken it to you last week, but hey, that's what we do! Either way, a good read. Check it out. Official: Complete Cast and Crew Details of 'Thalapathy 61' Surprise surprise to all the Suriya fans out there. A new notification from the 'Thaana Serndha Kootam' team that had come out then will clearly give the fans what they wanted. Suriya changes plans for 'Thaana Serndha Koottam' to delight his fans We are all aware of the immense moral as well as monetary support that Raghava Lawrence offered to the young protesters of Jallikattu. The choreographer-cum-actor had just gone ahead and made a bold statement. Celebrities do give out a lot of mumbo jumbo talk, yes, but rest assured, Raghava did mean what he said. Raghava Lawrence reprises his word of entering politics If you were a Thala fan, we bet you might've tried scrolling down to read just this. Well actually, chances are, if you were one, you wouldn't have to read this to know about it. But anyway, much, much, much hyped Thala57's first look poster was released to the excitement and awe of supporters worldwide. Once the clock ticked 00:01 hrs, then titled Vivegam's first look poster took everyone by surprise, and started to spread like forest fire. 'Thala 57' Vivegam first look revealed- Here is our take on it Guess who joined the Malayalam superstar along with Vishal in a first time Mollywood debut! Click here to know how she charmed her way through the megabudget film. Breaking : Hansika to team up with a Superstar and Vishal Two hot bollywood actresses may join the 'Sangamithra' league with the movie in its pre-production stages. Although still not official, its only coherent that it will soon be. Sundar C's hot Bollywood heroines for Jayam Ravi and Arya Much to the appreciation of fans, Bogan really proved its worth as a movie that got so much hype. While the actors got accolade from fans unanimously, here's the film's first day collections. Jayam Ravi's 'Bogan' First Day Collections Man of guts Vishal who had a legal slugfest with the Producers Council after a dramatic turn of events, came up with a daunting move and guess who backed him? Kamal proposes Vishal as Presidential Candidate for Producers Council Talking at an audio launch function, Producer Gnanavel Raja turned irate and made an open challenge. To whom, you ask? Its obvious, but check it out. "I will put you in jail and live stream it"-Gnanavel Raja's angry speech Don't worry about missing out on the hottest news.
